name: Study ID
instruction: Although this field is not typically captured on a CRF, it should be displayed clearly on the CRF and/or the EDC system. This field can be included into the database or populated during SDTM-based dataset creation before submission.

name: Date informed consent obtained
instruction: This will be the same information on informed consent used in the SDTM Disposition domain

name: Time informed consent obtained
instruction: This will be the same information on informed consent used in the SDTM Disposition domain

name: Date informed consent obtained by Parents/Legally Acceptable Representative (LAR) [de-activated]
description: Informed Consent Date (Legal or authorised representative 1)
instruction: This will be the same information on informed consent used in the SDTM Disposition domain
